languages.text: Последствия появления Великого Разлома затронули весь космос — его влияние проявляется в аномалиях пространства и времени, а также усилении иных варп-штормов, что может приводить к таким последствиям, как исчезновение ранее известных маршрутов через Имматериум.

The impact of the Great Rift can be felt throughout the entire cosmos, manifesting in anomalies of space and time, as well as in the intensification of other warp storms, which in turn can lead to the disappearance of previously known routes through the Immaterium.
languages.original_text: Последствия появления Великого Разлома затронули весь космос — его влияние проявляется в аномалиях пространства и времени, а также усилении иных варп-штормов, что может приводить к таким последствиям, как исчезновение ранее известных маршрутов через Имматериум.

traits.locale_text: The impact of the Great Rift can be felt throughout the entire cosmos, manifesting in anomalies of space and time, as well as in the intensification of other warp storms, which in turn can lead to the disappearance of previously known routes through the Immaterium.

The impact of the Great Rift can be felt throughout the entire cosmos, manifesting in anomalies of space and time, as well as in the intensification of other warp storms, which in turn can lead to the disappearance of previously known routes through the Immaterium.

languages.text: Die Auswirkungen des Großen Risses sind im gesamten Kosmos spürbar und äußern sich in Raum-Zeit-Anomalien sowie in der Verstärkung anderer Warpstürme, was wiederum zum Verschwinden bisher bekannter Wege durch das Immaterium führen kann.
languages.original_text: The impact of the Great Rift can be felt throughout the entire cosmos, manifesting in anomalies of space and time, as well as in the intensification of other warp storms, which in turn can lead to the disappearance of previously known routes through the Immaterium.

traits.locale_text: Die Auswirkungen des Großen Risses sind im gesamten Kosmos spürbar und äußern sich in Raum-Zeit-Anomalien sowie in der Verstärkung anderer Warpstürme, was wiederum zum Verschwinden bisher bekannter Wege durch das Immaterium führen kann.

languages.text: El impacto de la Gran Fisura se deja sentir por todo el cosmos, manifestándose en forma de anomalías espaciotemporales, así como en la intensificación de otras tormentas de disformidad, lo que a su vez conduce a la desaparición de rutas conocidas del Inmaterio.
languages.original_text: The impact of the Great Rift can be felt throughout the entire cosmos, manifesting in anomalies of space and time, as well as in the intensification of other warp storms, which in turn can lead to the disappearance of previously known routes through the Immaterium.

traits.locale_text: El impacto de la Gran Fisura se deja sentir por todo el cosmos, manifestándose en forma de anomalías espaciotemporales, así como en la intensificación de otras tormentas de disformidad, lo que a su vez conduce a la desaparición de rutas conocidas del Inmaterio.

languages.text: L'impact de la Grande Faille se fait ressentir dans le cosmos tout entier, se manifestant sous la forme d'anomalies spatiales et temporelles et par l'intensification des autres tempêtes Warp qui, à leur tour, peuvent entraîner la disparition des anciens itinéraires connus à travers l'Immaterium.
languages.original_text: The impact of the Great Rift can be felt throughout the entire cosmos, manifesting in anomalies of space and time, as well as in the intensification of other warp storms, which in turn can lead to the disappearance of previously known routes through the Immaterium.

traits.locale_text: L'impact de la Grande Faille se fait ressentir dans le cosmos tout entier, se manifestant sous la forme d'anomalies spatiales et temporelles et par l'intensification des autres tempêtes Warp qui, à leur tour, peuvent entraîner la disparition des anciens itinéraires connus à travers l'Immaterium.

languages.text: 〈大亀裂〉の影響は時空の異常や他の〈歪み〉の嵐の激化として現れ、宇宙全体で感じられる。そのため、これまでに知られていた非物質世界を通るルートが消失する可能性がある。
languages.original_text: The impact of the Great Rift can be felt throughout the entire cosmos, manifesting in anomalies of space and time, as well as in the intensification of other warp storms, which in turn can lead to the disappearance of previously known routes through the Immaterium.

traits.locale_text: 〈大亀裂〉の影響は時空の異常や他の〈歪み〉の嵐の激化として現れ、宇宙全体で感じられる。そのため、これまでに知られていた非物質世界を通るルートが消失する可能性がある。

languages.text: 大裂隙对整个宇宙造成了影响，造成了时空异常，亚空间风暴也变得更加剧烈。由于这个原因，之前穿越亚空间的已知航线都消失得无影无踪。
languages.original_text: The impact of the Great Rift can be felt throughout the entire cosmos, manifesting in anomalies of space and time, as well as in the intensification of other warp storms, which in turn can lead to the disappearance of previously known routes through the Immaterium.

traits.locale_text: 大裂隙对整个宇宙造成了影响，造成了时空异常，亚空间风暴也变得更加剧烈。由于这个原因，之前穿越亚空间的已知航线都消失得无影无踪。
